availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sidney T. Morrow (Hopkins/ Webster Co., KY, schoolteacher and farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, schoolteacher and farmer. North Carolina native. Son of John Morrow Sr. and Mary Morrow. Married to Drucilla Morrow. Father of David C. Morrow. Schoolteacher in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860. Farmer in Madisonville in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 127B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 613-14.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, September 1863, p. 15.
"Sidney T. Morrow (1830-1889)," Find A Grave, Memorial #113707875, accessed November 4, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/113707875.
